column5: just wondering what to expect fishing or camping is like at this place, the parks ontario website is a little vague, anyone with experience at this place? thanks in advance
stay away from the highway.. you can hear the cars at night if you are too close.... you should be able to hook into some panfish and maybe pike at the docks..

I was there on the long weekend and i only seemed to fish at night time because of the crappy weather we had during the days on saturday and sunday. We were at site number 30 right on the water and had no luck the first night. The second night we had loads of brown bull heads. Last year during bass season i caught a 3lb smallmouth right off of the boat launch. Lots of sun fish during day light hours to when it wasnt raining lol
Buddie was there last year for a week, said it was the wore lake on the planet....seriously. But you cant catch fish till you try!
I forgot to mention i have caught crappie and pike in there aswell
leave the rod at home, the lake BLOWS
